name: Spells Battle
description:
•  Welcome to Spells Battle.
  •  Protect the tower, fight soldiers, use your spells.

HOW TO PLAY

Use the spells to avoid soldiers to destroy your tower.

SPELLS

ARMYBOMBCROSSDEFENDERSHOCKWAVESpawn 7 alliesExplode enemies
Kill enemies within a cross patternSpawn a super-allyKill or damage every entity, damage the towerSNAPTHUNDERTORNADOTRAPSWIZARDKill nearest enemiesStrike 5 random enemiesAttract entitiesPlace 5 trapsSpawn a wizard who invokes fire entities

CREDITS

SFX: https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/

Tower, Entities: https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii

CONTACT

HAVE FUN !
